text: Anne Lacaton (born 2 August 1955) is a French architect and educator. She runs the architectural practice Lacaton & Vassal with Jean-Philippe Vassal. The pair were jointly awarded the 2021 Pritzker Architecture Prize. Lacaton was born in Saint-Pardoux-la-Rivière. She graduated in architecture from the École nationale supérieure d'architecture et de paysage de Bordeaux (ENSAPBx) in 1980. ==References== ==Other websites== *Lacaton & Vassal Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:French academics Category:French architects Category:Pritzker Architecture Prize winners Category:People from Dordogne
title: Anne Lacaton
